name: 锦鱼图
description:
Your daily life is broken by a sudden struggle.
A clueless case, a dagger covers in the smile.
A vast conspiracy lies behind seemingly unconnected events.
What is the right choice in the face of such obstacles?
Is it for home? For the emperor? Or for yourself?
Should we be flial? Be loyal? Or be Justice?
Let's go to resolve the case from the hidden reality, tower out a path to the truth!


#The epic of the Ming dynasty# The Voyages of Zheng He, The Incident of Tumu Fortress, The National Deffense War... These history stories will be presented in front of you. Follow the protagonist and experience the mysterious past, which has been sealed by the dust of history books.



#Plot interpretation# Full-process dubbing, audio plot comics, excellent audio-visual effects, and vivid interactive dialogues. In "Ming Imperial Guards" have many distinct and lifelike characters, such as a cool swordswoman, a playful sister, a lovely family etc.



#The transposition life# leap onto roofs and vault over walls to catch thieves, being resourceful to break the mystery case, experiencing the life of the Imperial Guards in an immersive way. Make friends and feel the lofty sentiments in the world of "Ming Imperial Guards".



#Various games# You paly various casual game, such as sand table games, parkour to catch thieves, puzzle solving, battles, etc. Easy to get play, lots of fun!



#Mutiple endings# With up to 40 side endings, you can choose to spend your life in an ordinary way or become a hero in a turbulent situation. Every seemingly insignificant choice may bring dramatic changes to your life.
